course.name: The Playbook 2026 – Masterclass for Designers
course.description: 30-day, production-grade design playbook build. Visual language, semantics, layout, tokens, components, governance, capstone playbook. 20–30 min per day with tangible artifacts.

lessons.title: From Taste to System: Scaling Decisions
Change Management for the Design System
Teaching the System to the Team
